metadata.title: CVE-2014-6053 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The rfbProcessClientNormalMessage function in libvncserver/rfbserver.c in LibVNCServer 0.9.9 and earlier does not properly handle attempts to send a large amount of ClientCutText data, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption or daemon crash) via a crafted message that is processed by using a single unchecked malloc.

criterions.comment: tightvnc package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
vino package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.22.0-6ubuntu1').
